Malton

YO17 8HX

OS Grid Ref: SE 88721 73175

Denomination: Church of England

View location on Google Maps

Description

Paper roll of honour set in a wooden frame.

Inscription

Greater love hath no man than this,/ that a man lay down his life for his friends/ Roll of Honour/ Names of the men from this Parish who have given their lives for their King and Country/ 1914-1918/ George Francis Clomley/ 18 October, 1914/ George Wm. Jefferson/ “Good Hope” 3rd November, 1914/ John Law/ Jutland Battle/ Ernest Nendick/ The Somme 29th October, 1916/ Herbert Hesseltine/ Palestine 3rd November, 1917/ 1939-1945/ William White/ Killed in action in Normandy 13h July, 1944/ “Blessed are the dead”/ Father, in Thy gracious keeping/ Leave we now Thy servants sleeping.

Inscription legible?

yes
